/usr/bin/c++  “-std=c++11”  -rdynamic   -o test-xfer /usr/local/lib/libLLVMSupport.a /usr/local/lib/libLLVMCore.a /usr/local/lib/libLLVMIRReader.a /usr/local/lib/libLLVMAsmParser.a /usr/local/lib/libLLVMBitReader.a /usr/local/lib/libLLVMCore.a /usr/local/lib/libLLVMBinaryFormat.a /usr/local/lib/libLLVMSupport.a -lrt -ldl -ltinfo -lpthread -lm /usr/local/lib/libLLVMDemangle.a
